projects.projSummary: Implemented a Graph and Heap to find the quickest route from a starting index to an ending index
Implemented a Hashtable to create a search egnine that would use keywords to check whether a given input was present in the files and if so at what frequency
Implemented a Binary Search Tree and a Queue to map a set of intervals in numerical order
Implemented Stacks to compute basic mathematical expressions
Implemented Linked Lists to encrpt and decrpyt a message using the Bruce Scheiner's Solitaire Encryption Algorithm
Created a C Program that takes in a file of y86 assembly instructions and data and simulates the y86 program

description.desc: Begun the redesign of the company webpage by using Illustrator to design the layouts for the site and HTML5/CSS/JavaScript to create the front-end of the homepage
Added user-interface features such as a search engine and a messaging component into an IOS app using Swift in Xcode and Firebase

Specifically used the bootstrap framework to make all design aspects of the website mobile ready.

Worked on adding functionality to a conversational style chatbot using the python flask framework that improved the operational efficiency of IT teams significantly by automating highly manual workflows.
